meanings.definition: Signs or symbols used to convey information or instructions.
meanings.sent1: The signages at the zoo directed visitors to the different animal exhibits.
meanings.sent2: The city's signages helped tourists find their way around the busy streets.
meanings.sent3: The confusing signages at the amusement park led the visitors in circles.
meanings.sent4: The colorful signages in the market painted a vibrant picture of the bustling area.
meanings.sent5: The neon signages outside the store made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: The act or process of displaying signs or symbols.
meanings.sent1: The signages of the safety rules were prominently displayed in the workplace.
meanings.sent2: The efficient signages of the traffic lights helped regulate the flow of cars.
meanings.sent3: The exaggerated signages in the play made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The grand signages of the event were a beacon of excitement in the town.
meanings.sent5: The interactive signages in the museum engaged visitors of all ages.

meanings.definition: The design or arrangement of signs or symbols.
meanings.sent1: The signages of the store were carefully planned to attract customers.
meanings.sent2: The artistic signages of the restaurant added a touch of elegance to the decor.
meanings.sent3: The mismatched signages in the park created a whimsical and quirky atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The futuristic signages of the exhibition gave a glimpse into the world of technology.
meanings.sent5: The vintage signages of the old town brought a sense of nostalgia to the streets.
